verses.verse: <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>"But,<s%> <S%H539>behold,<s%> they will not believe <S%H8085>me,<s%> nor listen to my <S%H6963>voice;<s%> for they will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh has not appeared to <S%H7200>you.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3027>him,<s%> "What is that in your hand?" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "A <S%H4294>rod.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7993>"Throw<s%> it on the <S%H776>ground.<s%>" He <S%H7993>threw<s%> it on the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and it became a <S%H5175>snake;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> ran <S%H5127>away<s%> from <S%H6440>it.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Stretch <S%H7971>out<s%> your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H270>take<s%> it by the <S%H2180>tail.<s%>" He stretched <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and took <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H4294>it,<s%> and it became a rod in his <S%H3709>hand.<s%>

"That they may <S%H539>believe<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> has appeared to <S%H7200>you.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5750>furthermore<s%> to <S%H935>him,<s%> "Now put your <S%H3027>hand<s%> inside your <S%H2436>cloak.<s%>" He <S%H935>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> inside his <S%H2436>cloak,<s%> and when he <S%H3318>took<s%> it <S%H3027>out,<s%> behold, his hand was <S%H6879>leprous,<s%> as white as <S%H7950>snow.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>"Put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> inside your <S%H2436>cloak<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>" He <S%H7725>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> inside his <S%H2436>cloak<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and when he <S%H3318>took<s%> it out of his <S%H2436>cloak,<s%> <S%H7725>behold,<s%> it had turned again as his other <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

"It will <S%H539>happen,<s%> if they will neither believe you nor <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H226>sign,<s%> that they will <S%H539>believe<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H226>sign.<s%>

It will <S%H539>happen,<s%> if they will not believe even these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H226>signs,<s%> neither <S%H8085>listen<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> that you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> and <S%H8210>pour<s%> it on the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H4325>land.<s%> The water which you <S%H3947>take<s%> out of the <S%H2975>river<s%> will become <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the dry <S%H3006>land.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H994>"O<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H376>I<s%> am not <S%H1697>eloquent,<s%> neither <S%H8032>before<s%> <S%H227>now,<s%> nor since you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant;<s%> for I am <S%H3515>slow<s%> of <S%H6310>speech,<s%> and of a <S%H3515>slow<s%> <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7760>him,<s%> "Who made <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth?<s%> Or who <S%H7760>makes<s%> one <S%H483>mute,<s%> or <S%H2795>deaf,<s%> or <S%H6493>seeing,<s%> or <S%H5787>blind?<s%> <S%H3068>Isn't<s%> it I, Yahweh?
Now therefore <S%H3212>go,<s%> and I will be with your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H3384>teach<s%> you what you shall <S%H1696>speak.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>"Oh,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> please <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H3027>someone<s%> <S%H7971>else.<s%>"

The <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "What about <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite?<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that he can <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H1696>well.<s%> <S%H3318>Also,<s%> behold, he comes out to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H7200>you.<s%> When he sees <S%H8055>you,<s%> he will be glad in his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

You shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H7760>him,<s%> and put the <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> I will be with your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and with his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and will <S%H3384>teach<s%> you what you shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>
He will be your <S%H1696>spokesman<s%> to the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and it will <S%H6310>happen,<s%> that he will be to you a mouth, and you will be to him as <S%H430>God.<s%>
You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> this <S%H4294>rod<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> with which you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H226>signs.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3500>Jethro<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Please let me go and <S%H7725>return<s%> to my <S%H251>brothers<s%> who are in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> whether they are <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2416>alive.<s%>" <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> for all the <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H1245>sought<s%> your <S%H5315>life<s%> are <S%H4191>dead.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H7392>set<s%> them on a <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H4294>rod<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "When you <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> that you <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> all the <S%H4159>wonders<s%> which I have <S%H7760>put<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> but I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> and he will not let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>
You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is my <S%H1121>son,<s%> my <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%>

and I have <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>you,<s%> "Let my son <S%H7971>go,<s%> that he may <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3985>me;<s%>" and you have refused to let him <S%H7971>go.<s%> <S%H2026>Behold,<s%> I will kill your <S%H1121>son,<s%> your <S%H1060>firstborn.<s%>'"
It happened on the <S%H1870>way<s%> at a lodging <S%H4411>place,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6298>met<s%> Moses and <S%H1245>wanted<s%> to kill <S%H4191>him.<s%>

Then <S%H6855>Zipporah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H6864>flint,<s%> and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> of her <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5060>cast<s%> it at his <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Surely you are a <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> of blood to <S%H1818>me.<s%>"
So he let him <S%H7503>alone.<s%> Then she <S%H559>said,<s%> "You are a <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%>" because of the <S%H4139>circumcision.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>" He <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H6298>met<s%> him on <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and kissed <S%H5401>him.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with which he had <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H226>him,<s%> and all the signs with which he had instructed <S%H6680>him.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and gathered <S%H622>together<s%> all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H539>believed,<s%> and when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6485>visited<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that he had <S%H7200>seen<s%> their <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> then they bowed their <S%H6915>heads<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped.<s%>
